# Item 21: Generalizability
The items from STROBE state that you should report: 
•	Discuss the generalizability (external validity) of the study results

3.11.2 – Objectives
Specific examples from QA:
•	21 Describe generalizability of simulation-based outcomes to patient-based outcomes (if applicable).
•	21.1 Discuss study setting, type of hospital, local epidemiology for the generalisability
